name: Fishing
description: Apply for a rod licence, check local laws by your location
policies: Given you are in England, Wales or the Border Esk region of Scotland When you fish for salmon, trout, freshwater fish, smelt and eel with a rod and line Then you need a fishing rod licence
Given you are fishing on the River Thames Then you need an additional licence
Given you are between 12 and 16 years old Then you qualify for a discounted licence
Given you are registered disabled Then you qualify for a discounted fishing licence
Given you are older than 65 Then you qualify for a discounted fishing licence
